cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(cge LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target

    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)

else()
    target_compile_options(cge PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)

endif()

endif()
